西班牙最高法院判處加泰羅尼亞大區前副主席13年監禁

￼

2019年10月14日16:39

據央視新聞客戶端消息，在2017年10月1日加泰羅尼亞大區政府進行非法公投並單方面宣佈獨立後，西班牙最高法院經過約兩年的司法審理，於10月14日對前參與加泰羅尼亞獨立進程的領導人進行最終審判，並對9名主要領導人判處9至13年的有期徒刑，其中加泰羅尼亞大區前副主席奧里爾·容克拉斯(Oriol Junqueras)因挪用公款及煽動獨立罪被判處最高刑期13年。其餘3名領導人被判處一年零8個月的撤銷職務及10個月每天200歐元的罰款。

Well... This was awful. Three points and all, but Ter Stegen as the best on pitch on all three Champions League matches this season doesn't inspire much confidence for the upcoming three, especially when two of them are against tough opposition.

Every time Dembélé comes on, the attack instantly gets quicker, sharper and better… until Suárez receives the ball and destroys the whole scoring opportunity. Valverde certainly fears the moment he subs Suarez off for Dembélé to have the Frenchman alongside Griezmann and Messi, is the moment the Uruguayan won't start again.

Atrocious as ever by Suárez, he simply doesn't have what it takes to play for a top tier club anymore, he's done no matter if he scores a banger now and then, simple as that. I am grateful for his contributions for Barcelona, but this is it.

Valverde spent a year asking Barcelona to sign Griezmann, just to start him on the wing where he’s useless. It's outrageous. What's the point, Suárez plays by decree, why?

Piqué is still at Anfield, down in the ground. Awful start to the season, says a lot that the best match the team had defensively (Eibar) he wasn’t in the lineup.

Tactically, a mess. #ValverdeOut

Arthur best Barça player this season after Ter Stegen. He’s getting better by the day, much more dynamic and proactive compared to last season. Frenkie is consistently excellent but he's not totally adapted yet.

Messi looked sharper, could've had a hattrick in his best days. Lenglet reliable again, Semedo was decent.

Improvements needed urgently...

Atrocious as ever by Suárez, he simply doesn't have what it takes to play for a top tier club anymore, he's done no matter if he scores a banger now and then, simple as that. I am grateful for his contributions for Barcelona, but this is it.

Valverde spent a year asking Barcelona to sign Griezmann, just to start him on the wing where he’s useless. It's outrageous. What's the point, Suárez plays by decree, why?

Piqué is still at Anfield, down in the ground. Awful start to the season, says a lot that the best match the team had defensively (Eibar) he wasn’t in the lineup.

Tactically, a mess. #ValverdeOut

Arthur best Barça player this season after Ter Stegen. He’s getting better by the day, much more dynamic and proactive compared to last season. Frenkie is consistently excellent but he's not totally adapted yet.

Messi looked sharper, could've had a hattrick in his best days. Lenglet reliable again, Semedo was decent.

Improvements needed urgently...
